title: Sophie McNeill on Twitter
readable_content:
Sophie McNeill (2023-07-04): Massive story: The @IEA says Australia is vastly underreporting methane pollution. "Australia’s coal mines were responsible for about 81% more fugitive methane emissions than official statistics show, while oil & gas production generated 92% more." smh.com.au
